channel.title: Chargers – Cloud Chemistry
channel.description: Premium eLiquid Custom Handmade to Order™

item.title: Pivoi QI Fast Wireless Charger Pad
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Compatible Devices: iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/X/8/8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 10/Note 10+/S20/S20+/S10+/S9, AirPods Pro and many more!
item.content:encoded:
Pivoi wireless charging pad is a Qi certified charging device that wirelessly charges your Qi enabled devices!

The slim Pivoi wireless charger pad provides ample surface area to charge your device efficiently. Use the Pivoi wireless charging pad to charge compatible devices including iPhone 11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/XS Max/X/8/8+, Samsung Galaxy Note 10/Note 10+/S20/S20+/S10+/S9, and AirPods Pro and many more.

Specifications: DC Input 5V/2A and 9V/1.6A Output 10W

Design: High grade silicone body with ample surface space, portable and lightweight, suitable use for workplace, home and travel.

Features: Foreign Object Detection ( An LED light will flash rapidly letting you know if something metal is on the charger and needs to be removed.) , Overheat Protection and  Over Voltage Protection.

Package Content:

  • 1 x  Pivoi Wireless Charger Pad
  • 1 x  USB to Micro USB Cable
  • 1 x  Instruction Manual

item.title: USB to Type C Cable
item.dc:creator: Matteo Laki
item.description: Very durable 3.3 ft long charging cable to charge your smartphone or device conveniently!
item.content:encoded:
VOI USB to Type C cables a 3.3 ft long charging cable to charge your smartphone or device conveniently. Get fast charging speed and seamless data transfer with this USB to Type C cable from VOI. Use the VOI USB to Type C cable with your Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 S8 S20 Plus, Note 10 9 8, LG V50 V40, Moto Z Z3, Other Type C smartphones and devices.

Design: Braided Red & Black color, 3.3 ft long charging cable goes through multiple quality tests for durability.

Features: Charges Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 S8 S20 Plus, Note 10 9 8, LG V50 V40, Moto Z Z3, and Other Type C smartphones and devices.

Package Content:

  • 1 x VOI USB to Type C Cable (Red) – 3.3ft

item.title: Xtar PB2 Portable Charger / Power Bank
item.dc:creator: James
item.description: PORTABLE CHARGER WITH POWER BANK FUNCTION
item.content:encoded:
XTAR PB2 Portable Charger

THE REVOLUTION OF TRADITIONAL CHARGER – PORTABLE CHARGER WITH POWER BANK FUNCTION

  • Used As A Battery Charger:• Max real 2A x 1 / 1A x 2 charge current, fully charge 1 x 2500mAh 18650 in 1.5 hrs or 2 x 2500mAh 18650 in 3 hrs.
    • Equipped with all XTAR unique features like 0V Activation function revives over-discharged batteries, TC/CC/CV three-stage charging maximizes battery lifespan, multi-protections and so on.
  • Used As A Power Bank:• Max 2.1 A USB output, fully charge iPhone 7 Plus in 2 hrs.
    • Protect our environment with replaceable batteries design, control the quality of the cells yourself and DIY the capacity of your mini power bank up to 7000mAh+
      •  Battery charge & discharge balancing technology makes all of capacity available for use and increase each cell’s longevity.
      •  Conversion efficiency up to 92%.
      •  Hand-held portable charger with magnetic cover design, fast charge your USB devices and all kinds of cell phones anywhere anytime
  • Package Contents:
  • 1 x PB2 Portable Charger
  • 1 x USB Cable
  • 1 x Multi-Language Manual

Portable Power Bank utilizing 2 x 18650 battery cells to recharge your internal battery devices on the go. *Batteries Not Included.

WARING: DO NOT USE THIS CHARGER TO RECHARGE EXTERNAL BATTERY CELLS THROUGH YOUR VAPE DEVICE OR ANY OTHER DEVICE/CHARGER!

item.title: 510 Thread Charger
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
Compatible with any 510 Standard USB charging port, the USB charger is an extremely convenient power source. You can charge your battery by screwing it into this USB charger and plugging the other end into a USB power source. The LED light on a battery will flash 3 times then turn solid in color. The USB charger can be plugged into most USB ports. You can also use it with a USB wall adapter (sold separately).

Sold individually.

Compatible with batteries or devices that require a 510 thread charger

NOTE: *AVAILABLE BRANDS/IMAGES MAY VARY*

item.title: eFest Slim K2 Charger
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
EFEST Slim K2 Intelligent Charger

Features:

  • Fast charging mode: 1.0A (4.2V 2pcs x 1.0A)
  • Fit to 3.6V or 3.7V Lithium battery in different size
  • Reverse polarity protection
  • Activation function
  • Auto-detect charging function
  • Over-charging protection
  • Short circuit protection

HIGH QUALITY: Spring made by piano wire, it provides a smooth sliding action when installing and removing batteries. Steel cathode with low resistance and hard chromium plating processing to achieve a more precise charging voltage. 15,000 + times spring testing quality warranty.

Packing List:

  • Slim K2 Charger Body
  • USB Cable
  • Warranty Card
  • Operation Manual

Compatible with 18650, 20700, 21700, 26650 batteries & charging speed of 1.0 amp

item.title: eFest LUC 6 Charger
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Efest LUC V6 Charger is as advanced as they come. Featuring six individually monitored charging bays, this is the ultimate charging device for heavy-duty vape enthusiasts. Intelligent technology makes this charger incredibly easy to use and guaranteed to charge efficiently.

If you’re looking for an intelligent vape battery charger that can truly do it all, the LUC V6 is for you. With 6 bays, you can accomplish a lot of charging in a short period of time. A bright display screen lets you monitor each charge individually. The Efest LUC V6 Charger features lots of safety features so that you can simply insert your batteries and walk away. Each slot automatically cuts power once the battery has reached a full charge.

What’s Included

  • 1 x Efest LUC V6 Battery Charger
  • 1 x Power Cord
  • Instructional Manual
  • Warranty Card

Efest LUC V6 6-Bay LCD Universal Charger Features

  • 6-Bay Battery Charger
  • Indepently Charging and Monitoring
  • Default Charging Current – 0.68A
  • Maximum Charging Current – 2A
  • Auto Cut-Off Voltage – 4.20V
  • USB Output Charging Capability – DC 5V / 1A
  • Intuive LCD Display
  • Night Energy-Saving Mode
  • Low Battery Indicator
  • Reverse Polarity Protection
  • Over-Charging Protection
  • Over Current Protection
  • Over Voltage Protection
  • Reverse Polarity Protection
  • Short-Circuit Protection
  • Supports: 10440/14430/14500/16650/18350/18500/18650/26650

WARNING: This is an advanced Item. Please use at your own risk and always use proper precautions and handling as these are very sensitive to charging characteristics and may explode or burn if not properly handled. Please note that there is an inherent risk with the use of any and all rechargeable batteries in any circumstance. Cloud Chemistry is not responsible for any damage, injury, or defect caused by the improper use and/or mishandling of Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable batteries and chargers.

item.title: eFest LUC 4 Charger
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The intelligent way to charge your batteries. This is the charger to top all other chargers; it is capable of charging all battery styles, simultaneously. 4 port design allows for 4 batteries to be refueled at once, and each has an independent charge meter with all details. This charger is capable of charging most vape battery styles: 3.7V Li-ion/ LiMn, as well as 10440, 14500, 14650, 18500, 17670, 18650, 18700, 26500, 26650, etc. Automatically stops charging when batteries have reached full capacity. Multi-talented; ports can also be used to charge other devices such as a phone, iPad, etc. Reads battery charge capacity automatically, immediately.

What’s Included:

  • 1 x Efest LUC V4 LCD Smart Charger
  • 1 x AC Wall Plug
  • 1 x User Manual

Specs & Features:

  • 4 Charging channels
  • LCD Charger
  • Reverse Polarity/ Short-Circuit/ Over-Current Protection
  • Voltage activation function
  • Auto monitors battery power
  • Alarm notice
  • Compatible with most 3.7V LI-ion or LiMn batteries
  • USB output

WARNING: This is an advanced Item. Please use at your own risk and always use proper precautions and handling as these are very sensitive to charging characteristics and may explode or burn if not properly handled. Please note that there is an inherent risk with the use of any and all rechargeable batteries in any circumstance. Cloud Chemistry is not responsible for any damage, injury, or defect caused by the improper use and/or mishandling of Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable batteries and chargers.

item.title: eFest LUC 2/ V2/ S2 Charger
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
The Efest LUC V2, 2 bay smart battery charger with LCD screen, displays both voltage and battery capacity. Each charging bay has its own charging status display. Adjusts automatically to the discharge current of different battery sizes. 4 point protection system against over voltage, short-circuit, over-discharging, and reverse polarity protection. Auto stop when battery capacity hits full. 12-24V DC wide voltage charging Mode. Can handle most vape batteries: 3.7V Li-ion/ LiMn batteries, such as 10440, 14500, 14650, 18500, 17670, 18650, 18700, 26500, 26650. Using spacers for charging, charging is capable with 15270 or 14250 batteries.

What’s Included:

  • 1 x Efest LUC v2 LCD Smart Battery Charger
  • 1 x AC Wall Plug
  • 1 x User Manual

Specs & Features

  • HD Mini LCD Display
  • Automatically adjusts discharge current to charge different battery sizes
  • Automatically stops charging when full
  • Operation Temperature: 0 – 40°C
  • Input Voltage: DC 12 – 24V
  • Output Voltage: 4.1 +/- %

WARNING: This is an advanced Item. Please use at your own risk and always use proper precautions and handling as these are very sensitive to charging characteristics and may explode or burn if not properly handled. Please note that there is an inherent risk with the use of any and all rechargeable batteries in any circumstance. Cloud Chemistry is not responsible for any damage, injury, or defect caused by the improper use and/or mishandling of Li-ion (Lithium-ion), LiPo (Lithium-ion Polymer) and any rechargeable batteries and chargers.

item.title: eFest Soda Charger
item.dc:creator: James
item.content:encoded:
EFEST SODA Dual Battery Charger

Features & Specs

  • Adjust to rapid or normal charging
  • Two LED indicators display each battery charging process
  • Steel cathode with low resistance and hard chromium plating processing to achieve a more precise charging voltage
  • Spring made by piano wire, it provides a smooth sliding action when inserting and removing batteries
  • Compatible with: 3.6V/ 3.7V LiMn & Li-ion batteries

Input & Output:

  • Input 1: AC 100V – 240V/ 50Hz-60Hz
  • Input 2: DC 12V 1A
  • Output: 4.2V-2X0.5A, 4.2V-2X1A

Protection:

  • 4 kinds of protection as over-discharging, over-voltage, short-circuit, and reverse polarity protection
  • auto-stop when fully charged & auto-recharge when voltage lower than 3.90V
  • with DC wide voltage (12V-24V) charging mode
  • activation function: SODA can activate the low voltage batteries (less than or equal to 0.6V)

Includes:

  • Soda Charger Body
  • AC Cable
  • Gift Box

Certifications include – CE & RoHS, Durable, Reliable.

Compatible with 10440, 14500, 14650, 16340, 16650, 17650, 17670, 17350, 18350, 18490, 18500, 18650, 26500, 20700, 21700, 26650 batteries & two charging speeds; 0.5 amp & 1.0 amp
